96.eng-name: Holding Fast to the Qur'an and Sunnah

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Leave me as I leave you, for the people who were before you were ruined because of their questions and their differences over their prophets. So, if I forbid you to do something, then keep away from it. And if I order you to do something, then do of it as much as you can

chapter.ara-name: باب الاِقْتِدَاءِ بِسُنَنِ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: Following the Sunna of the Prophet (ﷺ)
